pkgmetadata.longdescription: Sequential Generalized Likelihood Ratio Decision Boundaries Proposed by Shih, Lai, Heyse and Chen (2010, doi:10.1002/Sim.4036) // We provide functions for computing the decision boundaries for pre-licensure vaccine trials using the Generalized Likelihood Ratio tests proposed by Shih, Lai, Heyse and Chen (2010, doi:10.1002/sim.4036).
